tables.name: PREFERRED_TRACKS
sql: SELECT trackid, name, albumid, mediatypeid, genreid, composer, milliseconds, bytes, unitprice
WHERE tr.genreid IN (SELECT id FROM preferred_genres)
OR tr.albumid IN (SELECT id FROM preferred_albums)

tables.name: LOVED_TRACKS
sql: SELECT trackid, name, albumid, mediatypeid, genreid, composer, milliseconds, bytes, unitprice
WHERE tr.genreid IN (SELECT id FROM preferred_genres)
AND tr.albumid IN (SELECT id FROM preferred_albums)

tables.name: PREFERRED_BUT_NOT_LOVED_CUSTOMERS
sql: JOIN chinook.invoice AS inv ON cu.customerid = inv.customerid
JOIN chinook.invoiceline AS il ON inv.invoiceid = il.invoiceid
WHERE il.trackid IN (SELECT pt.trackid FROM preferred_tracks AS pt)
AND il.trackid NOT IN (SELECT pt.trackid FROM loved_tracks AS pt)
